AXIS_REF_ETC_BASE_SM3.GetSlaveId (METH)
Â¶
METHOD GetSlaveId : SMC3_ETC_SlaveId
Returns the physical EtherCAT address and the number of the EtherCAT master
for the fieldbus slave of the drive.
